instructions: Go to the main phone Settings . Tap Advanced features . Tap S Pen > S Pen Remote . In the S Pen Remote options, tap Hold Down Pen Button To and tap Camera (if it's not already selected). You should be automatically returned to the S Pen Remote options screen. Next, scroll to App Actions . Tap Single Press , then select the action you'd like to perform when you press the S Pen button. Tap Double Press and select the action you want to perform when you double press the S Pen button.
